svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Fossil fuel production over the long-term, United Kingdom
Total fossil fuel production - differentiated by coal, oil and natural gas - by country over the long-run, measured in
Source: Coal production - The SHIFT Project, Oil production - Etemad & Luciana, Gas production - Etemad & Luciana
